google_reviews.author: Steven Eiselt
google_reviews.review: The apartments are older but well maintained (e.g. extensive roof maintenance was done during the summer of 2024). Liz, the onsite manager, routinely answers questions via text within 30 minutes and never failed to resolve any of my issues. The trees and foliage that line the walkways between the four apartment buildings are full of birds and squirrels which is always nice in the spring. The parking is plentiful, and the location is very nice for access to downtown and grocery shopping. The cost of rent is very affordable for the space of the apartments. Sad to leave but on to bigger and better things!

google_reviews.author: Rebecca Cohen
google_reviews.review: The apartments look nice on the inside, and onsite manager Liz is very kind and adaptable. Unfortunately Christy, the offsite manager, could majorly improve how she speaks to people in terms of unnecessary rudeness. I checked in to see how our rental app was coming and she proceeded to rightfully explain that she only makes reference calls once (sure, its frustrating when it means there was a miscommunication with someone and wont be revisited, but I understand from one busy woman to another) but then continue to state that our application is dead in the water. Hope Liz gets a raise though!

summary.text:
Good

The Park Terrace Apartments boasts an impressive location that provides easy access to downtown and nearby grocery shopping, as highlighted by one user review. Residents find the parking situation to be convenient, with plenty of space available. Additionally, the reasonable rent for the spacious apartments is appreciated by those who live there, making it an attractive option for budget-conscious renters. The apartments, although older, are well maintained, and efforts such as extensive roof maintenance have been noted by tenants. Many appreciate the natural surroundings, with the trees and foliage that attract birds and squirrels, enhancing the property's appeal.

Great

The onsite management at Park Terrace Apartments receives high praise, particularly from residents who admire Liz for her prompt and efficient problem-solving skills. Reviews commend her responsiveness, often addressing queries and concerns via text within 30 minutes, and her dedication to resolving issues has not gone unnoticed. This level of attentive service contributes to an overall positive living experience and leaves a lasting impression on residents. Those who have interacted with Liz express their satisfaction with the customer service they receive, highlighting this as a significant advantage to living at Park Terrace Apartments.

Bad

While the onsite management receives commendations, there are concerns regarding the offsite management at Park Terrace Apartments. A user review pointed out that the offsite manager, Christy, could improve her communication skills, citing an interaction where Christy was described as unnecessarily rude. This experience left a negative impression despite the user's understanding of the situation. Miscommunications seem to be a recurrent issue, especially concerning application processing, which some residents find frustrating when not handled with empathy. Improving these communication challenges could greatly enhance the overall resident experience.

Ugly

No particularly 'ugly' situations have been highlighted in the reviews for Park Terrace Apartments. Although there are areas in need of improvement, particularly with offsite management, there have been no reports of severe neglect or major grievances that one might categorize as ugly. Current reviews do not mention issues such as unreturned security deposits or persistent maintenance problems left unresolved. This indicates that while there are difficulties to address, the property management avoids the most egregious pitfalls reported at some other rental properties.
